page.title: 04BROADSTONE FARM
page.content: Broadstone Farm has had many different uses over the years. Mr. Cranfield, the owner for the past 35 years,has been involved in pigs and chickens as well as some crops but nowadays he spends his time hand making {Windsor} chairs from timber grown on the farm. Ash,Beech,Hazel and Sweet Chestnut are all used in the chair construction. His wife has an {art {studio next to the workshop. The farm comprises some {150 acres} adjacent to the Ashdown Forest and is probably worth in the region of{three {hundred thousand pounds.} The Cranfields have seen many changes to the local environment over the years and although they do not think that all of them have been for the better they lead happy and contented lives on their farm.
